"[ PERMISSION REQUEST ]"

 Thank you for choosing E Book. Before we proceed, we kindly ask for your storage permission on your device.

 "[ PERMISSION REQUIRED ]"

 "STORAGE:" This permission allows us to store and access files on your device.

 "[ WHY STORAGE PERMISSION IS REQUIRED ]"

 E Book needs access to your device's storage to fetch PDF files and their thumbnails.Please note that E Book operates offline, ensuring your privacy and convenience.

 "[ HOW TO GRANT PERMISSION ]"

 To grant permission for storage access, please tap 'Grant Permission' below. If you choose not to grant this permission, the application may not be accessible.
Are You Sure You Want To Exit ?
[ A U T H O R I Z A T I O N ]
This app requires storage permission to function properly. You can grant the permission in the [ App Settings >> Permissions >> Storage ]
This app requires storage permission to function properly. You can grant the permission in \n\n [ App Settings >> File And Media >> Allow Management Of All Files ]
